preCopyScript.value:
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = '@{item().targettable}' and TABLE_SCHEMA = '@{item().targetschema}')
    TRUNCATE table @{item().targettable};

ifFalseActivities.name: Update last update for full load

preCopyScript.value:
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = '@{item().targettable}' and TABLE_SCHEMA = '@{item().targetschema}')
    TRUNCATE table @{item().targettable};

ifFalseActivities.name: Update last update for full load

preCopyScript.value:
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = '@{item().tablename}')
    TRUNCATE table @{item().tablename};

sqlReaderQuery.value: select Lastupdatedate as date_comp from lookuptable where TableName = '@{item().Tablename}';
select * from @{item().TableName} where added_date > '@{activity('Lookup Incremental load').output.firstrow.date_comp}'

ifTrueActivities.name: Incremental Load Target Table Max Added Date
Incremental Load Update lookup Table Dates

dependsOn.activity: Incremental Load Target Table Max Added Date

preCopyScript.value:
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = '@{item().tablename}')
    TRUNCATE table @{item().tablename};

sqlReaderQuery.value: select Lastupdatedate as date_comp from lookuptable where TableName = '@{item().Tablename}';

select * from @{item().tablename}
where added_date > '@{activity('Lookup Incremental load').output.firstRow.date_comp}';

ifTrueActivities.name: Incremental Load Target Table Max Added Date
Incremental Load Update lookup Table Dates

dependsOn.activity: Incremental Load Target Table Max Added Date

activities.name: to get total pages on api

dependsOn.activity: to get total pages on api

activities.name: Copy data from api to seprate page

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from @{pipeline().parameters.srcTableName}
where @{pipeline().parameters.waterMarkCol} > 
'@{activity('lookup old watermark').output.firstRow.waterMarkVal}' 
and @{pipeline().parameters.waterMarkCol} <= 
'@{activity('lookup New watermark').output.firstRow.NewwaterMarkVal}'

activities.name: merge data from stage to target

dependsOn.activity: merge data from stage to target
